original_title: Pedro Diabo Ama Rosa Meia Noite
overview: Unhappy with what he'd got from life, Pedro Diabo becomes a dread outlaw, whom the police is looking for. In his life of crime, he has the love and support of a strange woman, Rosa Meia-Noite, chorus girl who likes to wear rich costumes in Carnival Balls.
tagline: When a man finds the love of his life, he ceases to fear death
title: Pedro Diabo Loves Rosa Meia Noite
